da: MEMO: KÆRE SENIOR ROCKLY. SØRG FOR, AT IKKE EN <w>ENESTE</w>, <s>POKKERS</s>, <w><s><c=31, 79, 44>KLAM</c></s></w> SJÆL RØRER DENNE HALVMÅNE!
en: MEMO: DEAR SENIOR ROCKLY. PLEASE ENSURE NOT A <w>SINGLE</w>, <s>DARN</s>, <w><s><c=31, 79, 44>STINKIN'</c></s></w> SOUL TOUCHES THIS CRESCENT!
pt-BR: NOTA: CARO SENIOR ROCKLY. POR FAVOR CERTIFIQUE-SE QUE <w>NENHUM</w>, <s>MALDITO</s>, <w><s><c=31, 79, 44>PODRE</c></s></w> ALMA TOQUE NESSA CRESCENTE!
